price: 16. Kowelisa lolemu nayo te тропа kotanga na yango (kurani).
arabic: لَا تُحَرِّكۡ بِهِۦ لِسَانَكَ لِتَعۡجَلَ بِهِۦٓ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: lā tuḥarrik bihi lisānaka litaʿjala bihi
